item.title: diffraction
item.description: Konsep-konsep terkait difraksi [1]. notes Carl Rod Nave, “Diffraction”, HyperPhysics, 2017, url http://hyperphysics.phy-astr.gsu.edu/hbase/phyopt/diffracon.html [20220406]. Cite as: viridi, "diffraction", bugx, 6 Apr 2022, url https://dudung.github.io/bugx/0043 [20220417].

item.title: huygens' principle
item.description: Prinsip Hyugens [1], [2], [3]. Pernyataan prinsip Huygens [1]. Ilustrasi untuk celah tidak sempit [2]. Animasi [3]. notes Andrew Zimmerman Jones, “Huygens’ Principle of Diffraction”, ThoughtCo., 10 Nov 2019, url https://www.thoughtco.com/huygens-principle-2699047 [20220406]. Carl Rod Nave, “Huygens’ Principle”, HyperPhysics, 2017, url http://hyperphysics.phy-astr.gsu.edu/hbase/phyopt/huygen.html [20220406]. Wikipedia contributors, “Huygens–Fresnel principle”, Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia, 4 April 2022, 03:59 UTC, url https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?oldid=1080899215 [20220406]. Cite as: viridi, "huygens' principle", bugx, 6 Apr 2022, url https://dudung.
